      • getPlayerCount

        public CompletableFuture<Integer> getPlayerCount(String serverName)
        Get the amount of players on a certain server, or on ALL the servers.
        Parameters:
        serverName - the server name of the server to get the player count of, or ALL to get the global player count
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return the amount of players on a certain server, or on ALL the servers.

      • getPlayerList

        public CompletableFuture<List<String>> getPlayerList(String serverName)
        Get a list of players connected on a certain server, or on ALL the servers.
        Parameters:
        serverName - the name of the server to get the list of connected players, or ALL for global online player list
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return a list of players connected on a certain server, or on ALL the servers.

      • getServers

        public CompletableFuture<List<String>> getServers()
        Get a list of server name strings, as defined in BungeeCord's config.yml
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return a list of server name strings, as defined in BungeeCord's config.yml

      • connect

        public void connect(Player player,
                    String serverName)
        Connects a player to said subserver.
        Parameters:
        player - the player you want to teleport
        serverName - the name of server to connect to, as defined in BungeeCord config.yml

      • connectOther

        public void connectOther(String playerName,
                         String server)
        Connect a named player to said subserver.
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player to teleport
        server - name of server to connect to, as defined in BungeeCord config.yml

      • getIp

        public CompletableFuture<InetSocketAddress> getIp(Player player)
        Get the (real) IP of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player you wish to get the IP of.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return the (real) IP of player.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String playerName,
                        String message)
        Send a message (as in, a chat message) to the specified player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player to send the chat message
        message - the message to send to the player

      • getServer

        public CompletableFuture<String> getServer()
        Get this server's name, as defined in BungeeCord's config.yml
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return the server's name, as defined in BungeeCord's config.yml

      • getUUID

        public CompletableFuture<String> getUUID(Player player)
        Request the UUID of this player
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose UUID you requested
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return the UUID of player

      • getServerIp

        public CompletableFuture<InetSocketAddress> getServerIp(String serverName)
        Request the IP of any server on this proxy
        Parameters:
        serverName - the name of the server
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that, when completed, will return the requested ip

      • kickPlayer

        public void kickPlayer(String playerName,
                       String kickMessage)
        Kick any player on this proxy
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        kickMessage - the reason the player is kicked with

      • forward

        public void forward(String server,
                    String channelName,
                    byte[] data)
        Send a custom plugin message to said server. This is one of the most useful channels ever. Remember, the sending and receiving server(s) need to have a player online.
        Parameters:
        server - the name of the server to send to, ALL to send to every server (except the one sending the plugin message), or ONLINE to send to every server that's online (except the one sending the plugin message).
        channelName - Subchannel for plugin usage.
        data - data to send.

      • forwardToPlayer

        public void forwardToPlayer(String playerName,
                            String channelName,
                            byte[] data)
        Send a custom plugin message to specific player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player to send to.
        channelName - Subchannel for plugin usage.
        data - data to send.

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
        Unregister message channels.
